metadata.title: CVE-2024-26736 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: afs:Increase buffer size in afs_update_volume_status() The max length ofvolume->vid value is 20 characters. So increase idbuf[] size up to 24 toavoid overflow. Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) withSVACE. [DH: Actually, it's 20 + NUL, so increase it to 24 and usesnprintf()]
